title: [K-12] Orff Music Game-Based Pedagogy Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Music Theory and Instrument Performance Experience
context.additional_context: Blended classroom environment centered on digital device-based practical training and formative assessments, strengthening job-ready skills for music education career seekers.

learning_goals: Understand Orff music education philosophy and explain at least three game-based teaching methods
Creatively design and implement at least five Orff music games that integrate rhythm, melody, and physical expression
Develop music education game scenarios using digital tools and propose strategies to improve learner engagement by at least 20%
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
